anya-e0803n4:8_0: Tadevaṁ nāmikaṁ ñe yyaṁ, saliṅgaṁ savibhattikaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:11_0: Paṭhamā dutiyā tatiyā, catutthī pañcamī tathā;
anya-e0803n4:12_0: Chaṭṭhī ca sattamī cāti, honti satta vibhattiyo.
anya-e0803n4:13_0: Liṅgatthe paṭhamā sāyaṁ, bhinnā dvedhā siyo iti;
anya-e0803n4:14_0: Kammatthe dutiyā sāpi, bhinnā aṁ yo iti dvidhā.
anya-e0803n4:15_0: Karaṇe tatiyā sāpi, bhinnā nā hi iti dvidhā;
anya-e0803n4:16_0: Sampadāne catutthī sā, bhinnā dvedhā sa naṁ iti.
anya-e0803n4:17_0: Apādāne pañcamī sā, bhinnā dvedhā smā hi iti;
anya-e0803n4:18_0: Chaṭṭhī sāmimhi sā cāpi, bhinnā dvedhā sa naṁ iti.
anya-e0803n4:19_0: Okāse sattamī sāpi, bhinnā dvedhā smiṁsu iti;
anya-e0803n4:23_0: Yo karotisa kattātu, taṁ kammaṁ yaṁ karoti vā;
anya-e0803n4:24_0: Kubbate yena vā tantu, karaṇaṁ iti saññitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:25_0: Deti rocati vā yassa, sampadānanti taṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0803n4:26_0: Yatopeti bhayaṁ vā taṁ, apādānanti kittitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:27_0: Yassāyatto samūhovā, taṁ ve sāmīti desitaṁ;
anya-e0803n4:31_0: Vinā ālapanatthaṁ liṅgatthādīsu paṭhamādivibhattuppatti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:32_0: Idamettha niruttilakkhaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ – paccattavacane paṭhamā vibhatti bhavati,
anya-e0803n4:35_0: Tatra paccattavacanaṁ nāma tividhaliṅgavavatthānagatānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ paccattasabhāvaniddesattho.
anya-e0803n4:36_0: Bhūto, bhāvako, bhavo, abhavo, bhāvo, abhāvo, sabhāvo, sabbhāvo, sambhavo, pabhavo, pabhāvo, anubhavo, ānubhāvo, parābhavo, vibhavo, pātubhāvo, āvibhāvo, tirobhāvo, vinābhāvo, sotthibhāvo, atthibhāvo,
anya-e0803n4:38_0: Bhavaṁ, parābhavaṁ, paribhavaṁ, abhibhavaṁ, anubhavaṁ, samanubhavaṁ, paccanubhavaṁ, pabhavaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:41_0: Sayambhū, pabhū, abhibhū, vibhū, adhibhū, patibhū, gotrabhū, vatrabhū, parābhibhū, rūpābhibhū, saddābhibhū, gandhābhibhū, rasābhibhū, phoṭṭhabbābhibhū, dhammābhibhū,
anya-e0803n4:43_4: Ettha sattoti atthavācako bhūtasaddoyeva niyogā pulliṅgantipi daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n4:44_0: Ye pana ‘‘yo dhammo bhūto, yā dhammajāti bhūtā,
anya-e0803n4:44_1: yaṁ dhammajātaṁ bhūta’’nti evaṁ liṅgattaye yojanārahattā aniyataliṅgā aññepi bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādayo sandissanti pāvacanavare,
anya-e0803n4:44_2: tepi nānopasagganipātapadehi yojanavasena saddaracanāyaṁ sukhumatthaggahaṇe ca viññūnaṁ kosallajananatthaṁ niyatapulliṅgesu pakkhipitvā dassessāma.
anya-e0803n4:45_0: Seyyathidaṁ? Bhūto, parābhūto, sambhūto, vibhūto, pātubhūto, āvibhūto, tirobhūto, vinābhūto, bhabbo, paribhūto, abhibhūto, adhibhūto, addhabhūto, anubhūto, samanubhūto, paccanubhūto, bhāvito, sambhāvito, vibhāvito, paribhāvito, anuparibhūto, paribhavitabbo, paribhotabbo, paribhavanīyo, abhibhavitabbo, abhibhotabbo, abhibhavanīyo, adhibhavitabbo, adhibhotabbo, adhibhavanīyo, anubhavitabbo, anubhotabbo, anubhavanīyo, samanubhavitabbo, samanubhotabbo, samanubhavanīyo, paccanubhavitabbo, paccanubhotabbo, paccanubhavanīyo, bhāvetabbo, bhāvanīyo, sambhāvetabbo, sambhāvanīyo, vibhāvetabbo, vibhāvanīyo, paribhāvetabbo, paribhāvanīyo, bhavamāno, vibhavamāno, paribhavamāno, abhibhavamāno, anubhavamāno, samanubhavamāno, paccanubhavamāno, anubhonto, samanubhonto, paccanubhonto, sambhonto, abhisambhonto, bhāvento, sambhāvento, vibhāvento , paribhāvento, paribhaviyamāno, paribhuyyamāno, abhibhaviyamāno, abhibhūyamāno, anubhaviyamāno, anubhuyyamāno, samanubhaviyamāno, samanubhuyyamāno, paccanubhaviyamāno,
anya-e0803n4:48_0: Bhūrī, bhūtī, bhotī, vibhāvinī, parivibhāvinī, sambhāvinī, pātubhavantī, pātubhontī, paribhavantī, paribhontī, abhibhavantī, abhibhontī, adhibhavantī, adhibhontī, anubhavantī, anubhontī, samanubhavantī, samanubhontī, paccanubhavantī, paccanubhontī, abhisambhavantī,
anya-e0803n4:51_3: okārantassa vā gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve tena saddhiṁ chabbidhānipi honti,
anya-e0803n4:52_1: sambhūtāti sabbaṁ vitthārato gahetabbaṁ ‘‘anubhonto samanubhonto’’tiādīni nava padāni vajjetvā.
anya-e0803n4:52_4: Evaṁ ākārantādivasena catubbidhāni itthiliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni.
anya-e0803n4:53_0: Bhūtaṁ, mahābhūtaṁ, bhavittaṁ, bhūnaṁ, bhavanaṁ, parābhavanaṁ, sambhavanaṁ, vibhavanaṁ, pātubhavanaṁ, āvibhavanaṁ, tirobhavanaṁ, vinābhavanaṁ, sotthibhavanaṁ, paribhavanaṁ, abhibhavanaṁ, adhibhavanaṁ, anubhavanaṁ, samanubhavanaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:56_1: Ettha sattabhūtarūpavācako bhūtasaddoyeva niyogā napuṁsakaliṅgotipi daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:56_2: Etthāpi aniyataliṅgā bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddādayo napuṁsakaliṅgavasena yujjante.
anya-e0803n4:57_0: Kathaṁ? Bhūtaṁ, parābhūtaṁ, sambhūtaṁ, vibhūtaṁ. Peyyālo. Samanubhavamānaṁ, paccanubhavamānaṁ, anubhontaṁ, anubhavantaṁ, samanubhontaṁ, samanubhavantaṁ, paccanubhontaṁ, paccanubhavantaṁ, sambhontaṁ, sambhavantaṁ, abhisambhontaṁ, abhisambhavantaṁ, pātubhontaṁ, pātubhavantaṁ, paribhontaṁ, paribhavantaṁ, abhibhontaṁ, abhibhavantaṁ, adhibhontaṁ, adhibhavantaṁ, bhāventaṁ, sambhāventaṁ, vibhāventaṁ, paribhāventaṁ, paribhāviyamānaṁ, paribhuyyamānaṁ, peyyālo. Paccanubhaviyamānaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:57_2: Evaṁ niggahītantādivasena tividhāni napuṁsakaliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni .
anya-e0803n4:58_0: Ettha me appasiddhāti, ye ye saddā pakāsitā;
anya-e0803n4:60_0: O, ā, bindu, i, ī, u, ū-antime sattadhā ṭhitā;
anya-e0803n4:62_0: Ā ivaṇṇo cuvaṇṇo ca, pañca antā sarūpato;
anya-e0803n4:64_0: Bindu, i, u-ime antā, tayo ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
anya-e0803n4:66_0: Antā satteva pulliṅge, itthiyaṁ pañca vā cha vā;
anya-e0803n4:67_0: Napuṁsake tayo evaṁ, dasa pañcahi chabbidhā.
anya-e0803n4:68_0: Yasmā panettha ‘‘bhūto’’tiādayo saddā nibbacanābhidheyyakathanatthasādhakavacanapariyāyavacanatthuddhāravasena vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyā ca,
anya-e0803n4:68_1: tasmā imesaṁ nibbacanādīni yathāsambhavaṁ vakkhāma viññūnaṁ tuṭṭhijananatthañceva sotārānamatthesu paṭutarabuddhipaṭilābhāya ca.
anya-e0803n4:68_2: Tatra bhūtoti khandhapātubhāvena bhavatīti bhūto, idaṁ tāva nibbacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_3: ‘‘Bhūto’’ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena satto vuccati, idamabhidheyyakathanaṁ. ‘‘Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto. Sabbeva nikkhipissanti,
anya-e0803n4:68_4: bhūtā loke samussaya’’nti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_5: Atha vā bhūtoti evaṁnāmako amanussajātiyo sattaviseso, idamabhidheyyakathanaṁ. ‘‘Bhūtavijjā, bhūtavejjo,
anya-e0803n4:68_7: Yañca pana ‘‘satto macco pajā’’tiādikaṁ tattha tattha āgataṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:68_9: Yañca niddesapāḷiyaṁ ‘‘maccoti satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jagu jantu hindagu manujo’’ti āgataṁ, idampi pariyāyavacanameva.
anya-e0803n4:69_0: Satto macco jano bhūto, pāṇo hindagu puggalo;
anya-e0803n4:70_0: Jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato.
anya-e0803n4:71_0: Sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro;
anya-e0803n4:73_0: Pajāti itthiyaṁ vutto, liṅgato, na ca atthato;
anya-e0803n4:75_0: Yo so jaṅghāya ulati, so satto jaṅghalo idha;
anya-e0803n4:77_0: Imasmiṁ pakaraṇe ‘‘pariyāyavacana’’nti ca ‘‘abhidhāna’’nti ca ‘‘saṅkhā’’tiādīni ca ekatthāni adhippetāni,
anya-e0803n4:77_2: tappayogo upari atthattikavibhāge āvibhavissati. Bhāvakoti bhāvetīti bhāvako, idaṁ nibbacanaṁ. Yo bhāvanaṁ karoti, so bhāvako. Idamabhidheyyakathanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:77_5: Imāni ‘‘bhūto bhāvako’’ti dve padāni suddhakattuhetukattuvasena vuttānīti.
anya-e0803n4:77_6: Ito paraṁ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nibbacana’’nti ca ādīni avatvā katthaci atthasādhakavacanaṁ pariyāyavacanaṁ atthuddhārañca yathārahaṁ dassessāma.
anya-e0803n4:77_7: Tesu hi sabbattha dassitesu ganthavitthāro siyā, tasmā yesamattho uttāno,
anya-e0803n4:77_9: nibbacanamattameva nesaṁ kathessāma. Yesaṁ pana gambhīro attho, tesamabhidheyyaṁ kathessāma.
anya-e0803n4:78_1: Bhūsaddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā bhavanaṁ vaḍḍhananti katvā.
anya-e0803n4:78_2: ‘‘Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño’’ti idaṁ vuddhiatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:78_4: ‘‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’’ti hi sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi,
anya-e0803n4:78_5: tasmā bhavadiṭṭhī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Tathā bhavoti bhavadiṭṭhi,
anya-e0803n4:78_6: bhavati sassataṁ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma.
anya-e0803n4:78_9: Etthāyaṁ pāḷivacanattho – ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṁ saṁsāravisuddhiṁ kathayiṁsūti.
anya-e0803n4:78_10: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0803n4:78_12: Ettha panāyaṁ pāḷivacanattho – bhavoti sampatti, abhavoti vipatti. Tathā bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti sassataṁ, abhavoti ucchedo. Bhavoti puññaṁ, abhavoti pāpaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ vītivattoti.
anya-e0803n4:79_3: so sarūpaṁ labhatī’’ti katvā ‘‘bhavati avijjātaṇhādisamudayā nirantaraṁ samudetī’’ti atthena vā ‘‘bhavā’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n4:79_4: Okāso pana ‘‘bhavanti jāyanti ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā’’ti atthena ‘‘bhavo’’ti. Apica kammabhavopi bhavo, upapattibhavopi bhavo.
anya-e0803n4:79_10: kammaṁ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā ‘‘sukho buddhānamuppādo’’ti vutto.
anya-e0803n4:79_12: Atha vā bhāvanalakkhaṇattā bhāvetīti bhavo. Kiṁ bhāveti? Upapattiṁ.
anya-e0803n4:79_15: Atha vā ‘‘bhavapaccayā jātī’’ti vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:82_4: Bhavati ettha sattasammuti khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāte dhammapuñjasminti atthena .
anya-e0803n4:93_0: Bhāvoti ajjhāsayo, yo ‘‘adhippāyo’’tipi vuccati. ‘‘Thīnaṁbhāvo durājāno. Nāmacco rājabhariyāsu, bhāvaṁ kubbetha paṇḍito.
anya-e0803n4:93_1: Hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetī’’ti evamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica vatthudhammopi bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_4: bhāve ca te kusalaṁ natthi kiñcī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Kriyāpibhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_6: Apica bhāvoti sattavevacananti bhaṇanti, dhātu vā etaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:93_7: Tattha ajjhāsayo ca vatthudhammo ca cittañca satto cāti ime bhavatīti bhāvo. Tathā pana bhāvetīti bhāvo, kriyā tu bhavananti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_8: Sā ca bhavanagamanapacanādivasenānekavidhā. Apica bhāvarūpampi bhāvo,
anya-e0803n4:93_9: yaṁ itthibhāvo pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:93_10: Tatrāyaṁ vacanattho – ‘‘itthī’’ti vā ‘‘puriso’’ti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:96_1: itthīti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:96_2: tasmā pumbhāvoti etthāpi pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo,
anya-e0803n4:96_3: pumāti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti pumbhāvoti nibbacanaṁ samadhigantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:97_0: Abhāvoti na bhāvoti abhāvo, ko so? Suññatā natthitā.
anya-e0803n4:97_1: Sabhāvoti attano bhāvo sabhāvo, attano pakati iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:97_2: Atha vā sabhāvoti dhammānaṁ sati atthasambhave yo koci sarūpaṁ labhati,
anya-e0803n4:97_3: tassa bhāvo lakkhaṇamiti saññito namanaruppanakakkhaḷaphusanādiākāro iccevattho. ‘‘Sāmaññaṁ vā sabhāvo vā,
anya-e0803n4:97_4: dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ mata’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:97_5: Apica sabhāvoti salakkhaṇo paramatthadhammo. Kenaṭṭhena? Saha bhāvenāti atthena.
anya-e0803n4:97_6: Sabbhāvoti sataṁ bhāvo sabbhāvo, sappurisadhammo iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:98_0: Sambhavoti sambhavanaṁ sambhavo, sambhavanakriyā, yutti vā.
anya-e0803n4:98_1: Yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati ‘‘sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n4:98_3: Yato hi yaṁ kiñci sambhavati, so sambhavo.
anya-e0803n4:98_5: pabhavati etasmāti vā pabhavo. Yato hi yaṁ kiñci pabhavati, so pabhavo.
anya-e0803n4:98_6: Ime pana sambhavapabhavasaddā katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:98_7: Sambhavasaddo hi bhavanakriyampi vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi,
anya-e0803n4:98_8: pabhavasaddo pana bhavanakriyampi vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi,
anya-e0803n4:98_11: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘paccayo hetu nidānaṁ kāraṇaṁ sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṁ, byañjanato nāna’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:102_2: taṁ pana uttari āvibhavissati ‘‘dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūtī’’tiādinā.
anya-e0803n4:102_3: Iccevaṁ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni honti,
anya-e0803n4:102_4: yāni ‘‘kārakānī’’tipi vuccati, ito aññaṁ sādhanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0803n4:102_5: Idha payogesvatthesu ca viññūnaṁ pāṭavatthaṁ sādhananāmaṁ pakāsitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_6: Tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti,
anya-e0803n4:102_7: sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā honti, tasmā payogāsādhanamūlakā, attho ca payogamūlako.
anya-e0803n4:102_8: Payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṁ katvā atthaṁ kathanasīlā ‘‘yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati,
anya-e0803n4:102_9: appaṁ ayācito’’ti evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu,
anya-e0803n4:102_10: aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_11: Ito paraṁ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nāma sādhana’’nti na vakkhāma,
anya-e0803n4:102_12: kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu viññūnaṁ bahumānuppādanatthañceva vividhavicittapāḷigatike vividhatthasāre jinavaravacane sotūnaṁ buddhivijambhanatthañca atthasādhakavacanāniyeva yathārahaṁ suttageyyaveyyākaraṇagāthādīsu tato tato āharitvā dassessāma.
anya-e0803n4:103_0: Pabhāvoti pakārato bhavatīti pabhāvo, soyamānubhāvoyeva. ‘‘Pabhāvaṁ te na passāmi,
anya-e0803n4:103_1: yena tvaṁ mithilaṁ vaje’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:103_2: Anubhavoti anubhavanaṁ anubhavo, kiṁ taṁ? Paribhuñjanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:103_4: ‘‘Tejasaṅkhato ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:105_0: Ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade.
anya-e0803n4:108_1: ‘‘Anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_5: Apica ‘‘dhammadessī parābhavo’’ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_6: Atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kiṁ taṁ? Dhammadessitādi.
anya-e0803n4:108_7: ‘‘Paṭhamo so parābhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vibhavoti nibbānaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_8: Tañhi bhavato vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo,
anya-e0803n4:108_9: bhavassa ca taṁhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:108_10: Vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:109_0: Nibbānaṁ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṁ samaṁ;
anya-e0803n4:118_0: Santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_1: Tattha vināso vibhavanaṁ ucchijjanaṁ nassananti atthena vibhavo. ‘‘Vibhavo sabbadhammānaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:131_2: ittheke sato sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapentī’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_5: Dhanaṁ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti sattā etenāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:131_6: ‘‘Asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Idaṁ pana pariyāyavacanaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:132_0: Dhanaṁ saṁ vibhavo dabbaṁ, sāpateyyaṁ pariggaho;
anya-e0803n4:133_0: Oḍḍaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ sakaṁ attho, iccete dhanavācakā.
anya-e0803n4:134_0: Ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati ‘‘attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṁ na jāyatī’’ti gahaṇato vibhavoti.
anya-e0803n4:134_2: Vibhavataṇhāti hi ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya taṇhāya nāmaṁ. Ettha atthuddhāro vuccati –
anya-e0803n4:137_9: Natthibhāvoti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā suññatā. Okārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:138_0: Abhibhavatīti abhibhavitā, paraṁ abhibhavanto yo koci. Evaṁ paribhavitā, anubhavatīti anubhavitā,
anya-e0803n4:138_1: sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā anubhavanto yo koci. Evaṁ samanubhavitā. Paccanubhavitā,
anya-e0803n4:138_3: Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’’tiādīsu ‘‘dātā’’ti padānaṁ kattuvācakānaṁ ‘‘amatassā’’tiādīhi padehi kammavācakehi chaṭṭhiyantehi saddhiṁ yojanā dissati,
anya-e0803n4:138_4: tathā imesampi padānaṁ ‘‘paccāmittassa abhibhavitā’’tiādinā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n4:139_0: Bhavatīti bhavaṁ. Bhavissatīti vā bhavaṁ, vaḍḍhamāno puggalo. ‘‘Suvijāno bhavaṁ hoti, suvijāno parābhavo. Dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hoti,
anya-e0803n4:139_2: Atha vā yena saddhiṁ katheti, so ‘‘bhava’’nti vattabbo, ‘‘bhavaṁ kaccāyano. Bhavaṁ ānando. Maññe bhavaṁ patthayati,
anya-e0803n4:139_4: Ettha pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo,
anya-e0803n4:139_7: Vohāravisayasmiñhi lokasammuti eva padhānā avilaṅghanīyā. Parābhavatīti parābhavaṁ. Evaṁ paribhavaṁ. Abhibhavaṁ. Anubhavaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:139_8: Pabhavati pahoti sakkotīti pabhavaṁ, pahonto yo koci. Na pabhavaṁ appabhavaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:141_0: Sohaṁ appabhavaṁ tattha, sākhaṁ hatthehi aggahi’’nti
anya-e0803n4:143_1: Siribhūtīti sobhāya ceva paññāpuññānañca adhivacanaṁ. Sā assa bhavatūti siribhūti. Evaṁ sotthibhūti, suvatthibhūti. Ikārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:144_0: Bhāvīti bhavanasīlo bhāvī, bhavanadhammo bhāvī, bhavane sādhukārī bhāvī. Evaṁ vibhāvī. Sambhāvī. Paribhāvīti.
anya-e0803n4:144_1: Tatra vibhāvīti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati. Ettha vidvā, vijjāgato,
anya-e0803n4:145_0: Vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī;
anya-e0803n4:146_0: Budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū.
anya-e0803n4:147_0: Vipassī paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi;
anya-e0803n4:148_0: Kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:149_0: Cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0803n4:152_0: Sayambhūti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. Ko so?
anya-e0803n4:152_1: Antarena paropadesaṁ sāmaṁyeva sabbaṁ ñeyyadhammaṁ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṁ patto sakyamuni bhagavā. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n4:153_0: ‘‘Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0803n4:155_0: Ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0803n4:157_0: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro khandhasantāno sayambhū.
anya-e0803n4:157_1: So evaṁbhūto khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:157_2: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo ekapuggalo?
anya-e0803n4:157_7: sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho,
anya-e0803n4:157_9: siddhatthoti gahitanāmena ca pasiddho. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n4:158_0: Yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṁ varo;
anya-e0803n4:161_0: Sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca.
anya-e0803n4:186_0: Sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca;
anya-e0803n4:193_0: Nāmaṁ guṇehi nissitaṁ, ko kavindo kathessati.
anya-e0803n4:204_0: Tathā hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṁpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:211_1: Buddho jino bhagavāti evaṁpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:212_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhūti evaṁpakārānaṁ idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṁ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso atthī’’ti. Tanna,
anya-e0803n4:212_1: abhidhānānaṁ abhisaṅkharaṇīyānabhisaṅkharaṇīyavasena abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato.
anya-e0803n4:212_2: Tathā hi katthaci keci ‘‘sakyasīho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘sakyakesarī sakyamigādhipo’’tiādinā nānāvividhamabhidhānamabhisaṅkharonti,
anya-e0803n4:212_8: ‘‘Ambuja’’nti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘nīrajaṁ kuñja’’ntiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. Pāvacanepi hi yaṁ padumaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:212_9: taṁ jalajaṁ nāmāti mantvā paṭisambhidāppattehi ariyehi desanāvilāsavasena vutto ‘‘padumuttaranāmino’’ti vattabbaṭṭhāne ‘‘jalajuttaranāmino’’ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n4:213_1: Vuttañhetaṁ dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtena ‘‘buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ,
anya-e0803n4:213_2: vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:213_3: tathā ‘‘bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ…pe… sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ bhagavā’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:213_5: Na hi tāni abhidhānāni ceva ‘‘satthā sugato jino’’tiādīni ca aññaṁ kiñci abhidhānaṁ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni,
anya-e0803n4:213_6: nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n4:213_7: Tathā hi ‘‘buddho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_8: Tathā ‘‘bhagavā satthā sugato’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca ‘‘sampannabhago anusāsako sundaravacano’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_9: Evaṁ imaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū’’tiādinā nayena punarutti amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā. Evamaññatrāpi nayo netabbo. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n4:215_0: Dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṁ dvidhā bhave’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:216_0: Pabhūti paraṁ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro.
anya-e0803n4:216_1: ‘‘Araññassa pabhū ayaṁ luddako’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:216_2: Abhibhūti abhibhavatīti abhibhū, asaññasatto. Kiṁ so abhibhavi? Cattāro khandhe arūpino.
anya-e0803n4:216_3: Iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti abhibhū.
anya-e0803n4:216_4: So ca kho niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā’saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṁ saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi,
anya-e0803n4:216_5: tadabhibhavanakiccaṁ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti abhibhūti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:216_6: Apica niccetanabhāvena abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi sato tassa upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ yujjateva.
anya-e0803n4:216_7: Dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ. Taṁ yathā? Kūlaṁ patitukāmaṁ, evaṁ loke. Sāsane pana –
anya-e0803n4:219_1: phalesino chadanaṁ vippahāyā’’ti ca ‘‘phalaṁ toseti kassaka’’nti ca ādi.
anya-e0803n4:219_2: Abhibhūsaddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte ‘‘abhibhuṁ abhibhuto maññatī’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:219_3: Atha vā abhibhavatīti abhibhū, paresamabhibhavitā yo koci.
anya-e0803n4:219_5: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘tathāgato bhikkhave abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:219_6: Keci pana ‘‘abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n4:220_1: tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:220_2: Vibhūti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. Āha ca –
anya-e0803n4:225_0: Dhārento brāhmaṇaṁ vaṇṇaṁ, bhikkhāya maṁ upāgamī’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:226_3: Gotrabhūti gottasaṅkhātaṁ amatamahānibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū,
anya-e0803n4:226_6: Yesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti,
anya-e0803n4:226_12: ‘‘bhavissanti kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṁ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vatrabhūti sakko.
anya-e0803n4:226_13: So hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṁ labhitvā aññe deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū.
anya-e0803n4:226_14: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana bhūdhātumhi labbhamānaṁ pattiatthampi gahetvā ‘‘vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṁ pattoti vatrabhū’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:226_17: Ettha hi vatrabhūti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā.
anya-e0803n4:226_23: Sabbābhibhūti ca idaṁ nāmaṁ tathāgatasseva yujjati. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n4:232_0: Idāni aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūta sambhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:232_1: Tatra bhūtoti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto,
anya-e0803n4:232_2: bhūtoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto,
anya-e0803n4:232_3: bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako vā.
anya-e0803n4:232_5: bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo koci,
anya-e0803n4:232_8: Parābhūtoti parābhavīti parābhūto. Suṭṭhu bhūtoti sambhūto. Visesena bhūtoti vibhūto. Vissuto bhūtoti vā vibhūto,
anya-e0803n4:232_9: ‘‘vibhūtārammaṇa’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vibhavīti vā vibhūto, vinaṭṭhoti attho,
anya-e0803n4:232_10: ‘‘rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Pākaṭo bhūtoti pātubhūto. Āvi bhavatīti āvibhūto. Evaṁ tirobhūto. Vinābhūto. Bhavitumanucchavikoti bhabbo. Paribhaviyate soti paribhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_11: Yena kenaci yo pīḷito hīḷito vā, so paribhūto. Gamyamānattho yathākāmacārī.
anya-e0803n4:232_12: Abhibhaviyyate soti abhibhūto. Adhibhaviyate soti adhibhūto. Evaṁ addhabhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_16: tathā ‘‘idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṁ attānaṁ na addhabhāvetī’’ti padampi.
anya-e0803n4:233_0: Anubhaviyate soti anubhūto. Evaṁ samanubhūto. Paccanubhūto. Bhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:233_1: Ettha bhāvitoti iminā samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito’’tiādīsu guṇīvācakaṁ padhānapadaṁ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:233_5: te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho. Sambhāviyate soti sambhāvito. Evaṁ vibhāvito. Paribhāvito. Anuparibhūto.
anya-e0803n4:233_7: Ettha manaṁparibhūtoti īsakaṁ appattaparibhavano vuccati. Mananti hi nipātapadaṁ. ‘‘Atipaṇḍitena puttena, manamhi upakūlito,
anya-e0803n4:233_8: devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṁ nāsito,
anya-e0803n4:233_9: manaṁ vuḷho ahosī’’tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n4:235_0: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti.
anya-e0803n4:236_2: Tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne hi sakkuṇeyyapadayojanā dissati ‘‘aladdhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ laddhabbaṁ labhanīyaṁ laddhuṁ vā sakkuṇeyya’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:236_5: Tathā hi tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne arahatipadayojanā dissati ‘‘parisakkuṇeyyaṁ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:236_6: Ettha pana paribhottabboti padassa atthibhāve ‘‘khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:236_8: Sesāni dukāni nayānusārena ñeyyāni. Bhamānoti bhavatīti bhamāno, majjhe vakāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Atridaṁ vattabbaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:237_0: ‘‘Kiṁ so bhamāno saccako’’, iccatra pāḷiyaṁ pana;
anya-e0803n4:239_0: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘kiṁ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto,
anya-e0803n4:239_4: sa rājavasatiṁ vase’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:239_5: Yasmā panimāni ‘‘bhavamāno’’tiādīni vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā saramāno rodati, gacchanto gaṇhāti, ‘‘gacchanto so bhāradvājo,
anya-e0803n4:239_6: addasa accutaṁ isi’’ntiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n4:239_7: ‘‘Saramāno gacchanto’’tiādīni hi ‘‘yāto gato patto’’tiādīhi sadisāni na honti,
anya-e0803n4:240_0: Paribhaviyamānoti paribhaviyate soti paribhaviyamāno. Evaṁ paribhuyyamānotiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n4:240_2: tasmā ‘‘rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṁ cintesī’’tiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṁ gavesati.
anya-e0803n4:240_5: Ayaṁ aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddānaṁ niddeso.
anya-e0803n4:240_6: Iccevaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:241_0: Idāni itthiliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhāvikāti bhāvetīti bhāvikā. Yā bhāvanaṁ karoti, sā bhāvikā.
anya-e0803n4:241_1: Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṁ āsevanā bahulīkāro.
anya-e0803n4:241_4: Sambhāvanāti ukkaṁsanā thomanā. Paribhāvanāti vāsanā, samantato vā vaḍḍhanā. Ākārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:242_1: atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi. Bhūmi vuccati pathavī.
anya-e0803n4:242_2: ‘‘Paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā’’tiādīsu pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:242_3: Yā panandhabālamahājanena viññātā pathavī, tassimāni abhidhānāni –
anya-e0803n4:243_0: ‘‘Pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī;
anya-e0803n4:244_0: Chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā;
anya-e0803n4:245_0: Jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā’’iti.
anya-e0803n4:246_0: Atra bhū ku gosaddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?
anya-e0803n4:248_0: Bhū ku goiti pathavī, vuccatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0803n4:249_0: Bhūtīti bhavanaṁ bhūti. Vibhūtīti vināso, visesato bhavanaṁ vā,
anya-e0803n4:249_1: atha vā visesato bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti, sampattiyeva, ‘‘rañño vibhūti.
anya-e0803n4:249_2: Pihanīyā vibhūtiyo’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ikārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:250_1: Sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati,
anya-e0803n4:250_2: bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati cāti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_3: atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī.
anya-e0803n4:250_5: tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:250_6: Bhūrīsaddassa pathavīvacane ‘‘bhūripañño’’ti atthasādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica bhūrī viyāti bhūrī, paññā,
anya-e0803n4:250_7: bhūrīti pathavīsamāya vitthatāya paññāya nāmaṁ, ‘‘yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_8: ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_9: Atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī, paññāyetaṁ nāmaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:250_10: ‘‘bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_11: Atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_13: Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṁ ‘‘rāgaṁ abhibhūyatīti bhūrī, paññā. Dosaṁ mohaṁ…pe… rāgo ari, taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. Doso.
anya-e0803n4:250_14: Moho…pe… sabbe bhavagāmino kammā ari, taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā’’.
anya-e0803n4:250_15: Ettha pana ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti padamiva ‘‘aribhū’’ti vattabbepi bhūsaddaṁ pubbanipātaṁ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_16: Apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā labbhantiyeva,
anya-e0803n4:258_0: Ñāṇaṁ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0803n4:259_0: Mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṁ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti.
anya-e0803n4:260_0: Dhammo vijjā gati monaṁ, nepakkaṁ go matī muti;
anya-e0803n4:261_0: Vīmaṁsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca;
anya-e0803n4:275_3: Bhotīti yāya saddhiṁ kathentena sā itthī ‘‘bhotī’’ iti vattabbā,
anya-e0803n4:275_4: tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:275_5: Yathā hi purisena saddhiṁ kathentena puriso ‘‘bhavaṁ’’ iti vohariyati,
anya-e0803n4:275_6: evameva itthiyā saddhiṁ kathentena itthī ‘‘bhotī’’iti vohariyati. ‘‘Kuto nu bhavaṁ bhāradvājo, ime ānesi dārake’’ti, ‘‘ahaṁ bhotiṁ upaṭṭhissaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:275_7: mā bhotī kupitā ahū’’ti cettha nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:275_8: Atha vā idhekacco satto itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo, so ‘‘bhotī’’iti vattabbo,
anya-e0803n4:275_9: tasmā iminā padena itthīpi itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n4:275_10: Tathā hi devaputtopi ‘‘devatā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena voharitabbattā devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti voharito, pageva devadhītā.
anya-e0803n4:275_12: taṁ me akkhāhi pucchitā’’ti ettha pana devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato.
anya-e0803n4:275_13: Atrāyaṁ suttapadattho ‘‘yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko tāpaso na jānāti,
anya-e0803n4:275_14: bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki’’nti. Apica –
anya-e0803n4:277_0: Karomi te taṁ vacanaṁ, tvaṁsi ācariyo mamā’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:278_0: Maṭṭhakuṇḍalīvatthusmiṁ pulliṅgayakkhasaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘atthakāmo’’ti pulliṅgavasena itthiliṅgañca devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘hitakāmā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena purisabhūto maṭṭhakuṇḍalī voharito.
anya-e0803n4:279_0: ‘‘Na tvaṁ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṁ vaco’’ti;
anya-e0803n4:281_1: kusarājaṁ mahabbala’’nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena voharitā,
anya-e0803n4:281_2: tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā bhotī devatā, bhotī silā, bhotī jambū,
anya-e0803n4:281_4: Katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī itthī,
anya-e0803n4:281_6: Vibhāvinīti vibhāvetīti vibhāvinī. Evaṁ paribhāvinītiādīsupi. Īkārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:282_1: Atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti bhū. Bhū vuccati pathavī. Abhūti vaḍḍhivirahitā kathā, na bhūtapubbāti vā abhū, abhūtapubbā kathā. Na bhūtāti vā abhū, abhūtā kathā.
anya-e0803n4:282_3: pāpakaṁ vata bhāsasī’’ti idametesamatthānaṁ sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ūkārantitthiliṅganiddeso. Niyatitthiliṅganiddesoyaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:283_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṁ pana niyatitthiliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n4:283_1: Iccevaṁ itthiliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:284_0: Idāni napuṁsakaliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhūtanti catubbidhaṁ pathavīdhātuādikaṁ mahābhūtarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_2: bhavati vā tasmiṁ tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_3: Atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā.
anya-e0803n4:284_4: Bhūtanti hi napuṁsakavasena sakalo satto evaṁnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati. ‘‘Kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā. Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, ujjhāpetvāna bhūtāni,
anya-e0803n4:284_5: tamhā ṭhānā apakkamī’’ti evamādīsu napuṁsakappayogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n4:284_7: ‘‘yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṁ gaṇhanti, neva tesaṁ tassa anto,
anya-e0803n4:284_8: na bahi ṭhānaṁ upalabbhatī’’ti cuṇṇiyapadaracanāyampi bhūtasaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattadassanatoti avagantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_10: Tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:288_0: Yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṁ visesato.
anya-e0803n4:290_0: Idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu.
anya-e0803n4:293_1: Tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati, ‘‘janittaṁ me bhavittaṁ me,
anya-e0803n4:293_2: iti paṅke avassayi’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:296_0: Bhūnanti bhavanaṁ bhūnaṁ vaddhi. ‘‘Ahameva dūsiyā bhūnahatā, rañño mahāpatāpassā’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:296_1: ‘‘bhūnahaccaṁ kataṁ mayā’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:297_1: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi cāti bhavanaṁ vuccati geho,
anya-e0803n4:297_2: ‘‘pettikaṁ bhavanaṁ mamā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. ‘‘Geho gharañca āvāso,
anya-e0803n4:297_7: Pātubhavananti pākaṭatā sarūpalābho iccevattho. Āvibhavananti paccakkhabhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:297_8: Tirobhavananti paṭicchannabhāvo. Vinābhavananti vinābhāvo. Sotthibhavananti suvatthitā.
anya-e0803n4:297_9: Paribhavananti pīḷanā hīḷanā vā. Abhibhavananti vidhamanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:298_0: Atthavibhāvīti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṁ cittaṁ vā ñāṇaṁ vā kulaṁ vā atthavibhāvi. Evaṁ dhammavibhāvi.
anya-e0803n4:299_3: Apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṁ maggavīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:299_4: Tesu hi paṭhamaṁ puthujjanagottamabhibhavati, ariyagottañca bhāveti,
anya-e0803n4:299_5: gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati,
anya-e0803n4:299_6: dutiyaṁ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṁ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni phalacittāni gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati. Idaṁ pāḷivavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:304_0: Dīghabhāvena vuttaṁ tu, napuṁsakanti no vade;
anya-e0803n4:305_0: Binduvantī’tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n4:306_0: Īkārantā ca ūdantā, rassattaṁ yanti sāsane;
anya-e0803n4:308_1: cittena saha na bhavatīti nacittasahabhu, rūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:309_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyatanapuṁsakaliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n4:309_1: Iccevaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:314_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
